metadata.title: lacking data regarding the prevalence of RCT in FPM. This study aimed to determine the prevalence of RCT in FPM among children aged 9-18 years in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

conclusion.heading: Conclusion
conclusion.first_sentence: This study provides critical baseline data on the prevalence of RCT in FPMs among children in Jeddah, 5 Saudi Arabia.
